dt-option.summary: WAI-ARIA label for the _first_ pagination button
dt-option.default: There is no default value for this option as the `dt-init language.paginate.first` option contains a string by default.
dt-option.description: Set the ARIA label attribute for the _first_ pagination button. This can be particularly useful for cases where you wish to show an icon such as `«` in the button itself, while retaining full accessibility.
dt-option.name: language.aria.paginate.first

example.title: Define full paging language options as icons with ARIA label text
